job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the use of AI as a tool to enhance existing software development processes and productivity, rather than on the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of core AI models or systems. Phrases like 'AI as their co-pilot', 'elevating your coding skills', 'crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts', and 'AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge' suggest an emphasis on leveraging AI for efficiency and augmentation, which aligns with the definition of the 'Ambiguous' profile, particularly the part about 'primarilly focusses on the USE of AI tools to enhance productivity'.

job_tasks.justification: The role emphasizes 'implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving' and 'Drive the integration of AI into our development process', which are core software development activities augmented by AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency', which involves developing features that utilize AI outputs within a software context.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement' indicates a focus on integrating AI into the software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite' clearly points to software development tasks focused on integrating AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite

job_tasks.justification: The role aims to 'elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience', which requires understanding business objectives and market positioning.
job_tasks.phrase: elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience

soft_skills.phrase: predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge
pushing the boundaries of what's possible
